data.text: @OrrieLynn Hi, I have already replied to your other message. Kind regards, Derya
@munzglas Dies kann immer wieder vorkommen, wie oft können wir dir leider nicht beantworten. Hab´ ein schönes Wochenende. LG, Derya
@munzglas Hi, da wir momentan nicht viele Langstrecken anbieten wird die 777 auch auf den Europastrecken eingesetzt. Dies dient dazu damit unsere Flugzeuge in Betrieb bleiben. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@joge_jonny Hi Johannes, die Regelungen im Bezug auf Covid 19 kannst du gerne hier selber überprüfen https://t.co/NEdquDQTin. Liebe Grüße, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @MaxSandler_ Hi Max, thank you for reaching out. Please click on the following link https://t.co/ZdPEaZBdlL to find the contact form for sumibitting your compensation request. Kind regards, Derya
@orrielynn @ahoensbroech Hi, we already replied to your message. Best regards, Karin
@ZeiTooN_ Hi, what is your booking reference? Kind regards, Karin
@TravellingFan Hi, please mind that the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is 25 minutes. Kind regards, Christine
@02DClarke Hi, just follow the information which you received via the government site. Kind regards, Christine
@Aelius1984 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine
@ProfErickB Hi, was ist denn genau passiert? Bitte sende uns eine DM. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@expat_laura [2/2] please try it at different intervals. Kind regards, Derya

@expat_laura [1/2] Hi Laura, thank you for reaching out. I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@andrew_ryvkin Hi Andrew, how can we assist you? Kind regards, James
@BrynLucas Hi there, we as an Airline do not ask for a negative Covid test nor a vaccine to board the plane, unless it is an entry requirement for your destination. Kind regards, Ivana
@ranting_taylor Hi Taylor, you can also try to send your inquiry to our office in Vienna https://t.co/WBd3FgJtcg.vie@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@danielrschmidt Hi Daniel, vielen Dank für den Hinweis. Wir haben diesen Fall bereits an unsere zuständige Fachabteilung weitergeleitet. Liebe Grüße, James

@ranting_taylor Hi Taylor, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please contact our respective colleagues for further updates on your lost baggage. You can find the phone number on your baggage report. Our respective colleagues will further assist you. Kind regards, James
@AllEliteJim Hi Jim, on our long haul flights there will be a warm meal served free of charge ;) Kind regards, Sarah

data.text:
It’s a date! ❤️🗽
From 8 November, the US officially welcomes fully vaccinated EU-travelers again! We cannot wait for you to (re)discover the „land of opportunities“ with us! ✈️🇺🇸 

#ServusUSA #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/SY0N1n4AdR
@Reymon1Virginie @DFB_Team Dear Virginie, I have already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Derya

domain.name: Sports Team
domain.description: A sports team organization, like Arsenal and the Boston Celtics

data.text: @AllEliteJim Hi Jim, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you on board again soon. Kind regards, Chris
@Rachel37093433 Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana

@connaissir Hi, es freut uns sehr, dass du deinen Flug mit uns genossen hast und wir dich von unserem Service überzeugen konnten. Wir hoffen dich schon bald wieder an Bord eines unserer Flüge begrüßen zu dürfen. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@hockeyhiker Hi Dave, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

@JSarajevo Hi Jazzy, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Please send us the reference number of your claim in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@jvasuki Hi Julia, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@lukaskilian [1/2] Hi Lukas, Austrian Airlines ist als Fluggesellschaft nicht dazu verpflichtet, Corona-bedingte Nachweise zu verlangen, um eine Reise anzutreten.

@lukaskilian [2/2] Dennoch bitten wir alle Passagiere beim Check-in zu bestätigen, dass sie in den letzten 14 Tagen keinen Kontakt zu einem Covid-19-Fall hatten, nicht auf ein ausstehendes Testergebnis warten und nicht positiv getestet wurden. Liebe Grüße, James

@florianklenk [1/2] Hi Florian, grundsätzlich ist Austrian Airlines als Fluggesellschaft nicht dazu verpflichtet, Corona-bedingte Nachweise zu verlangen, um eine Reise anzutreten. Abhängig vom Ziel- bzw. Transitland kann es jedoch zu länderspezifischen Einreisebestimmungen kommen

@florianklenk [2/2] Die Kontrolle von Corona-relevanten Dokumenten hängt somit vom jeweiligen Zielort ab. Beim Online-Check-in oder am Check-in-Automaten muss der Passagier bestätigen, dass alle Einreisebestimmungen erfüllt sind. Liebe Grüße, James

@PatrickGruska @AHoensbroech Vielen Dank für die netten Worte, haben wir natürlich sofort an unseren Kollegen weitergeleitet.☺️Zu möglichen Gehaltsverhandlungen können wir leider keine Auskunft geben.🤓😉 Im @KURIERat ist übrigens auch ein Interview mit ihm erschienen 😎 https://t.co/TpdrzYVOvn

The ideal preparation for a football match starts with dancing a classic waltz up in the air, right? We had the pleasure to fly the @dfb_team to Skopje and back to Germany in “Austrian” style. Congratulations on the great performance! 🙌 🇩🇪 ⚽

#Servus #MKDGER #DieMannschaft https://t.co/q3LE4Z2lDP

data.text: @p_g_schmidt Liebe Patricia, derzeit haben wir zu Flügen nach Birmingham leider keine Informationen. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@sbrookner1 Hi Steven, I just replied to your other message. Kind regards, James
@Blanno_504 Hi Owen, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@NinjaWorrier Hi, please be so kind and send your request to https://t.co/WBd3FgJtcg.vie@austrian.com. Kind regards, Karin

@MaxSandler_ Dear Max, the Social Media team cannot send such confirmation. However, if you're entitled for a compensation you'll definitely receive it. We just cannot advise a certain time frame. We kindly ask for your patience and your understanding. Thank you. Kind regards, Ivana
@maxsandler_ Hi, due to the high amount of inquiries and due to short work we are facing longer waiting times. Thank you for your patience. Best regards, Karin
@HeleenTouquet Hi there, we are happy to hear that your request has been solved in the meantime and we look forward to welcoming you on board. Kind regards, Chris
@AllEliteJim Dear Jim, unfortunately not. At present, selected aircraft of our Airbus family for short and medium-haul routes are equipped with it. Kind regards, Ivana
@nycmittelalter Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@duberyfirkin Hi, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused. We can offer you a non-stop flight from Vienna to Manchester on November 29th, with OS463 10:20-11:55. Kind regards, James
@ThousandAway Hi Lisa, bitte sende uns in einer DM dein genaues Flugdatum sowie Flugnummer und Destination sowie den genauen Passagiername. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@GerhFried Hi, danke für dein Feedback. Wir werden dies an die zuständige Fachabteilung weiterleiten. Liebe Grüße, Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @HankoSwart Hi, we are sorry for the inconvenience. In order to bring your complaint to notice kindly send us your feedback via our online form https://t.co/xSuR0u4TUs. Kind regards, Christine

@amerukraine Hi Christian, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to get in touch with us. Please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@HvonSternberg Hi Andreas, danke für dein Feedback. Wir werden dieses intern weiterleiten. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@VentusCyrus @unsereOEBB Hi Pieter, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @VentusCyrus @unsereOEBB Hi, in tis case your ticket needs to be changed via our service center . You will find the contact list here https://t.co/xSuR0u4TUs. Kind regards, Christine
@candacewalsh Hi Candance, please provide us your booking code as a private message and we'll try to help. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@AllEliteJim Hi Jim, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana

@Elle_C_Arnaud Hi Emma, please be informed that your ticket won't be issued right away. It usually takes a couple of hours to be issued. You'll then receive your ticket automatically. Best regards, Christiane

@Elle_C_Arnaud Hi Emma, please be informed that your ticket won't be issued right away. It usually takes a couple of hours to be issued. You'll then receive your ticket automatically. Best regards, Christiane
@joshualeclair1 Hi Joshua, our flights to Montreal are already operating. Kind regards, Chris
@jordangerbsch Hi, please send us your booking reference. Kind regards, Karin

What an exciting match against @westham! @skrapid, you gave it all! 👍 Thank you for travelling with Austrian Airlines and we hope you had a pleasant stay on board. ⚽🛫 

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid #WHUSCR #UEL #SKRapid #SCR https://t.co/iTfE1B4oUh

data.text: @ElmarLeimgruber Hallo Elmar, bei uns steht dir der Web Check-in für den Großteil unserer Flüge ab 47 Std vor Abflug zu Verfügung. Ein früheres Einchecken ist nicht notwendig. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

Nothing but blue skies for our first flight to #Montreal after 18 months!✈️🍁 

Starting today, our lovely crew will fly you three times a week to beautiful Québec on one of our #Boeing767 aircraft!

Bon voyage!🇨🇦
#ServusCanada #AustrianAirlines @AirCanada https://t.co/I2dYBP9A4S

urls.title: FAQ Baggage
urls.description: Here you can find frequently asked questions and answers about the topic of baggage.

data.text: @3judy3  Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. You'll find the form via this link:https://t.co/Tu4e6nt56d. Best regards, Susi

Flying you around the world with our charming smiles since 1957 – and still no wrinkles! 🥰
Today, we are happy to celebrate our 64th anniversary! 🥳✈️🇦🇹 

#LovingTheWorld #Servus #AustrianAirlines https://t.co/qfhOfclKjE

We are adapting our #AIRail schedule with bagdrop possibility to our passengers’ demands. As of Friday, 1 Oct, you can test our service on an earlier daily connection from Salzburg (OS3546) & Linz (OS3504) to Vienna Airport!🧳🚆✈️
More info👉🏼https://t.co/YKA3kqvPBd

#ZugzumFlug https://t.co/zIdNOfEMyi
@alessiospar Hi Alessio, please be informed that our staff needs to check all necessary travel documents before issuing the boarding pass. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @AbhiChn06 Hi there, we ask all passengers to inform themselves about the individual country regulations. Regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane

@Gradsen @Aeroplan Hi, we can check for you. Please send us your booking code in a DM and your seat preference. Kind regards, Sarah
@CAntonescu @travelocity Hi Catalin, please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @ItsDavidNotDave Hi David, due to a medical incident the plane will now return to Vienna. Best regards, Susi
@Liliya63076869 Hi, we are sorry that you feel this way. Please contact your agent regarding a rebooking. Kind regards, Karin
@CAntonescu @travelocity Hi, it depends which fare conditions you purchased. According to your agent you purchased a non refundable ticket. Kind regards, Karin

data.text: @ThomasR12204237 Hi Thomas, currently, you don't need vaccination to fly with Austrian Airlines, unless it is an entry requirement for the destination. We adhere to the requirements of the local authorities of the individual country. Kind regadrs. Sarah

@CAntonescu Hi, when booking flights via online platforms, the platforms usually act as an intermediary between passengers and airline. This leads to the fact that we refer customers to the respective travel agencies and platforms for rebooking or refund requests. Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @ymstacky  Hallo, die Rechnung - der Passenger Receipt - ist dein elektronisches Ticket. Deine Bordkarte erhältst du sobald du den Check-in durchgeführt hast. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@guujhujj Hallo, für deinen Aufenthalt bei uns Bord benötigst du gar keinen Test. Sollte jedoch deine Zieldestination einen Test zur Einreise verlangen, musst du das negative Testergebnis bereits vor dem Boarding vorweisen. LG, Christiane
@monika134 Hallo Monika, Buchungen, die nicht direkt über das Profil gemacht wurden, können leider nicht im Nachhinein dazugefügt werden. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@vieco92 Dear Sam, however we cannot access the mentioned case. You can send us a DM with your e-mail address, your full name and we can send a note of urgency to the respective department. Kind regards, Ivana
@Vieco92 Dear Sam, the mentioned ID is not an Austrian Airlines case. It pretty much looks like a Lufthansa case number. Kind regards, Ivana

data.text: @monika134 Hallo Monika, hast du schon versucht über einen anderen Browser zu buchen? Wann erhältst du die Fehlermeldung? LG Sara

@GroupToStopHate Hi, All customers are asked to take account of currently valid entry and quarantine regulations at their respective destinations. We kindly ask you to contact the immigration authorities or the embassy regarding information on immigration regulations. Kind regards, Sara

@mattingham Hi Matt, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. For information on the currently valid entry regulations, please contact the responsible authorities directly. Kind regards, Chris
@GroupToStopHate Hi there, yes that's correct. Kind regards, Sara
@rahelab Hi Rahel, what do you mean? Are you having troubles to login or booking a flight? Because we're note facing any troubles on our Homepage at the moment. Kind regards, Ivana

@evieholbrow29 Hi Evie, we don't have any information on difficulties with the web check-in. What is the error message you receive? Please send us your booking in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@26magdi Hi there, according to your reservation, the flight from Cairo to Frankfurt is booked and confirmed, but your tickets have not been reissued to this flight. According to the check-in agent, you requested to postpone the flight once again. Best regards, Christiane

@SimoneTassler Hallo Simone, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Flugunregelmäßigkeit betroffen bist. Eine neue offizielle Abflugszeit wurde leider noch nicht bekannt gegeben. Wir wissen aktuell nur, dass der Flieger gegen 22 Uhr Ortszeit bei euch in TFS landen sollte. Liebe Grüße, Christiane
@pigletruth Hi Ruthi, N95 can be used on board as well. Kind regards, Sara
@KellyKellyhart Dear Kelly, you have to scroll a little down, where it says "How to store your hand luggage correctly". Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Information about carry-on baggage
urls.description: What can be taken on board the aircraft? Find out about the permitted size and weight of your hand luggage and what items are allowed on board before your trip.

data.text: @KellyKellyhart Hi Kelly, please find all information regarding handluggage via the following link: https://t.co/jQf6oV0LaB Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Anfrage zu Rückerstattungen
urls.description: Rückerstattungen für einen über die Austrian Airlines Website gebuchten Flug können Sie über unser Kontaktformular beantragen. Wir helfen Ihnen gern weiter.

data.text: @ererbe11 Hi Jakob, bitte kontaktiere bezüglich einer Refundierung unsere zuständige Abteilung über folgendes Formular: https://t.co/0xeArIGuaJ Unsere KollegInnen melden sich so schnell wie möglich bei dir. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@Gelerth Hi Jay, grundsätzlich ist Austrian Airlines als Fluggesellschaft nicht dazu verpflichtet, Corona-bedingte Nachweise zu verlangen, um eine Reise anzutreten. Abhängig vom Ziel- bzw. Transitland kann es jedoch zu länderspezifischen Einreisebestimmungen kommen. Freundiche Grüße,Chris
@echomarat1 @lufthansa Hi there, please send us your inquiry in a DM. Kind regards, Sara

data.text: @KelWilliams95 Hi Kellie, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at your refund request. Best regards, Christiane

@UnitedFlyer03 Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay on board. The responsible department will also bring your feedback to the attention of the department management and remind them of our service standards. Kind regards, Chris

@OraveczJudit Hi Judit, You do not need a test for the stay on board. However, if your destination requires a test you need to show your test before boarding. For information on the currently valid entry regulations, please contact the responsible authorities directly. Kind regards, Chris
@EliEttinger4 Hi Eli, please contact our responsible department via specialcases@austrian.com Our colleagues will be happy to assist. Kind regards, Chris
@taliena Hi Natalie, thank you for reaching out. We are still offering nonstop flights to Manchester a few times a week. When would you like to travel? Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @norapinedo56 Hi Nora, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look at your reservation. Kind regards, Chris
@norapinedo56 Hi Nora, unfortunately only in English or German. If there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM with your booking code. Kind regards, Ivana
@pigletruth Hi Ruthi, we as an Airline do not ask for a negative Covid test to board the plane, unless it is an entry requirement for your destination. Kind regards, Ivana
